transcript: about 70,went for interest on debts. The building of a new church, previously begun, had cost about 10,000 in each of the last two years, and he did not know how the rest, about 100,000 rubles, was spent, and almost every year he was obliged to borrow. Besides this the chief stew- ard wrote every year telling him of fires and bad harvests, or of the necessity of rebuild- ing factories and workshops.
